item.title: About
item.description: About Hello. I’m Theo. Software Developer Contact

Theodor Stancu Versatile software developer with a deep-seated enthusiasm for programming languages, compiler technology, and data engineering. [ tstancu.github.io ] . [ theo.stancu@gmail.com ] . [ +40 723 996 539 ] Education B.S in Computer Science, Faculty of Mathematics and Informatics - University of Bucharest (2021 - present) Final year Master’s Program - LUCA School of Arts (2016 - 2017) Film Directing | Brussels Bachelor’s degree, The National University of Theatre and Film “I.
